page.title: 11Farming
page.content: The size of farms is increasing due to economic pressures and a policy of amalgamation is being pursued by large land owners.This is especially true of potatoe and carrot producers which use large scale mechanisation and a low labour requirement. Some crops are grown on contract to processers but the majority are marketed through local produce merchants.Many of the farms also have their own farm shops for the general public. Plant nurseries are also an important feature in this area,each with its outlets to the public.
